rules.title: How to Play
rules.step1: A cat description will be read aloud.
rules.step2: Click on the cat photo that matches the description.
rules.step3: You get 1 point for a correct answer.
rules.step4: You can answer while the description is being read.
rules.step5: Game over when opponent gets 3 points.
rules.tip1: Reading speed increases as level goes up.
rules.tip3: From level 5, opponent gets points on timeout or wrong answer.
rules.tip5: Wrong answers don't give points to opponent.
